author: Sunitha Sekar
text:
Facilities will be introduced at St. Thomas Mount station to facilitate integration of the systems

A consultant will soon be appointed for stepping up the process of Chennai Metro Rail taking over the Mass Rapid Transit System (MRTS).

According to sources, a meeting was held recently to accelerate the process of merging both entities at the earliest.

“Chennai Metro Rail will soon call for a tender for appointing the consultant. The function of the consultant will be to look into the matters of finance and administration and various other issues to make way for the merger. There will be several rounds of discussion between the officials of Chennai Metro Rail and the Southern Railway even before the process of calling for consultants. This process will take time,” said the source.
title: Consultant soon for Metro-MRTS merger
